name: No Hammer No Job
description:
The game was created at Global Game Jam 2020 #GGJ20. 

In the game you need to repair swords in beautiful medieval forge. 

Try yourself and use basic blacksmith tools in multiple quick-time events.

Credits:

Olaf Gontarczyk - Programming
Tomek "Tumok" Bogowicz - Programming
Artur "ReVvoL" Orzeł - Level and UI Design
Jakub "Strzybor" Stachowski - Sound Design and Music
Igor "Dziobak" Samek - Visuals and Animations

Short How to Play:

1. Go to furnance

2. Go to Vice

3. Go to Anvil

4. Go to Wheel

There may be an issue with failing any mini-game, blocking ability to play the game again, so for safety - restart the title after failing any mini-game. ;)
